雷.definition: thunder; (bound form) (military) mine, as in 地雷[di4 lei2] land mine; (coll.) to shock; to stun; to astound; (Tw) (coll.) spoiler; (Tw) (coll.) to reveal plot details to (sb)

雷·羅馬諾.definition: Ray Romano (1957-), US actor and comedian

雷克薩斯.definition: Lexus; see also 凌志[Ling2 zhi4]

雷公.definition: Lei Gong or Duke of Thunder, the God of Thunder in Chinese mythology

雷公打豆腐.definition: the God of Thunder strikes bean curd; fig. to bully the weakest person; to pick on an easy target

雷公打豆腐，揀軟的欺.pinyin: Lei2 Gong1 da3 dou4 fu5 , jian3 ruan3 de5 qi1
雷公打豆腐，揀軟的欺.definition: the God of Thunder strikes bean curd, a bully picks the weakest person; to pick on an easy target

雷厲風行.definition: pass like thunder and move like the wind (idiom); swift and decisive reaction

雷大雨小.definition: lit. much thunder but little rain; fig. a lot of talk but little action; his bark is worse than his bite

雷姆斯汀.definition: variant of 德國戰車|德国战车, Rammstein (German metal band)

雷射.definition: laser (loanword used in Taiwan); also written 鐳射|镭射

雷山.definition: Leishan county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

雷山縣.definition: Leishan county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

雷峰塔.definition: Leifeng Pagoda, by West Lake until it was destroyed (also from Madam White Snake)

雷州市.definition: Leizhou, county-level city in Zhanjiang 湛江市[Zhan4jiang1 Shi4], Guangdong

雷德.definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009

雷扎耶湖.definition: Lake Urmia, northwest Iran, a major salt lake; formerly called lake Rezaiyeh

雷打不動.definition: not shaken by thunder (idiom); the arrangements are unalterable; to adhere rigidly to regulations; will go ahead whatever happens (of an arrangement or plan)

雷朗.definition: Luilang, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

雷朗族.definition: Luilang, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

雷根.definition: Taiwan equivalent of 里根[Li3 gen1]

雷波.definition: see 雷波縣|雷波县[Lei2bo1 Xian4]

雷波縣.definition: Leibo County in Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture 涼山彝族自治州|凉山彝族自治州[Liang2shan1 Yi2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1], Sichuan

雷神.definition: god of thunder (Chinese Leigong 雷公[Lei2 gong1], Norse Thor 索爾|索尔[Suo3 er3], Greek Zeus 宙斯[Zhou4 si1] etc)

雷聲大，雨點小.pinyin: lei2 sheng1 da4 , yu3 dian3 xiao3
雷聲大，雨點小.definition: lit. loud thunder, but only tiny drops of rain (idiom); fig. a lot of talk, but no action

雷蓋.definition: reggae (loanword); also written 雷鬼[lei2 gui3]

雷諾.definition: Reynolds (name); Renault (French car company); Reno, Nevada

雷諾數.definition: Reynolds number (ratio of inertial forces to viscous forces in fluid mechanics)

雷諾阿.definition: Renoir (name); Pierre-Auguste Renoir (1841-1919), French impressionist painter

雷鋒.definition: Lei Feng (1940-1962), made into a model of altruism and dedication to the Party by propaganda from 1963 onwards

雷雕.definition: laser cutting (abbr. for 雷射雕刻[lei2 she4 diao1 ke4])

雷電計.definition: brontometer; apparatus to measure thunder and lightning

雷鳥.definition: capercaillie (Lagopus, several species); thunderbird (in native American mythology)
